channel.title: No-ip problem
channel.description: Ok now i know how to put a server online on hamchi but i dont really like the hamchi servers so can anyone tell how to put my server on the main server screen? :) (i'm pretty sure theres somethong to do with No-ip)

item.title: No-ip problem
item.dc:creator: @pker_of_the_emoz pker of the emoz
item.description:
@pker_of_the_emoz wrote:

[quote=“fatcat, post:6, topic:164925”]What the hell are you on about…?
Mopar runs TCP/UDP[/quote]
You portforward you’r router; not you’r server, But in some cases it portforwards servers, Read the Portforward guide it tells you that

And if you didnt know i was joking about my above post
You must be a retard

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip problem
item.dc:creator: @fatcat fatcat
item.description:
@fatcat wrote:

What the hell are you on about…?
Mopar runs TCP/UDP

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip problem
item.dc:creator: @pker_of_the_emoz pker of the emoz
item.description:
@pker_of_the_emoz wrote:

[quote=“fatcat, post:4, topic:164925”]yes you can, to get people to join your server you need to allow people to connect to it.
The Default port is 43594, if your router’s firewall is blocking that port then no one can join.[/quote]
Oh yeah so im just gonna portforward my server in my admin panel yeah il add hmm a TCP port 43594 ehh yeah i might as well change those little text box’s that says 10.0.0.2 to my server ip so it portforwards my server hmm so what else uhmmm oh yeah instead of choosing TCP il choose SERVER

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip problem
item.dc:creator: @fatcat fatcat
item.description:
@fatcat wrote:

yes you can, to get people to join your server you need to allow people to connect to it.
The Default port is 43594, if your router’s firewall is blocking that port then no one can join.

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip problem
item.dc:creator: @pker_of_the_emoz pker of the emoz
item.description:
@pker_of_the_emoz wrote:

[quote=“fatcat, post:2, topic:164925”]no ip is just typing a name in instead of numbers e.g server.no-ip.org

TO get it working you need to port forward your moparscape server if you have a router,
or if you just have a modem. On the server select screen type in your ip (something like 67.102.4.54)

If you have done all the corectly people will be able to join.
You can find your ip by going to www.ip-adress.com[/quote]
Wtf you cant portforward a server

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip problem
item.dc:creator: @fatcat fatcat
item.description:
@fatcat wrote:

no ip is just typing a name in instead of numbers e.g server.no-ip.org

TO get it working you need to port forward your moparscape server if you have a router,
or if you just have a modem. On the server select screen type in your ip (something like 67.102.4.54)

If you have done all the corectly people will be able to join.
You can find your ip by going to www.ip-adress.com

Read full topic
